page.title: 01MERE HALL
page.content: Mere Hall is 450 years old. It is a large black and white farmhouse. Parts of the building are older than others because the house was built in stages with rooms added on as they were needed. This makes the house look uneven. One of the windows is slanting as the wall has slipped. Some of the windows are mullioned and have leaded lights. At the back of Mere Hall there is a black iron gate; behind this gate a few sheep are grazing.{Mere Hall has {a fishpond or mere after which the {hall was named.}It now has a swimming pool as well
